segments.text: I notice the little boy climbing up the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched awkwardly, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a risky move, and I can’t help but feel anxious for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls and gets hurt? The thought makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl beside him, almost urging him on with her open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so eager, but they both seem oblivious to the potential danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a sneaky little operation they’ve got going on, and I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR
